channel.title: Custom yell tags
channel.description: how i can make a npcs will set a yell tag only for donor ??

item.title: Custom yell tags
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“pk4agirl, post:3, topic:509593”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=627838.msg4266382#msg4266382 date=1364090124]

how i can make a npcs will set a yell tag only for donor ??

What?
You want an npc to set a yell tag for donors only?
Why not just have the tag get set when they receive donor?
[/quote]
yea that nice but ok so can i have a tutorial or what i have to search in google[/quote]
Can you type a single sentence correctly. It’s really hard to know what you want…

Read full topic
